title: LINE Corporation : consolidated revenue 2013 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 27 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in billion Japanese yen in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in billion Japanese yen 60.8 is found at Quarter Q4 '19 and the minimum is found at Q2 '13 where Quarter is 8.2.
The highest Quarter Q4 '19 has 52.6 more Revenue in billion Japanese yen than the lowest Quarter Q2 '13.
